message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could greatly benefit you and enhance your experience. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at $120. I hope you find it worth considering.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to adjust the price accordingly. For the product, I am now offering a price of $105. This still reflects its high value while being more accessible to you.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between value and cost.
